book.annotation: Ulysses chronicles the passage of Leopold Bloom through Dublin during an ordinary day, June 16, 1904.
book.author: James Joyce
book.title: Ulysses

book.annotation: Alonso Quixano, a retired country gentleman in his fifties, lives in an unnamed section of La Mancha with his niece and a housekeeper.
book.author: Miguel de Cervantes
book.title: Don Quixote

book.annotation: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark.
book.author: William Shakespeare
book.title: Hamlet
